name: percolate-mcp
description: Percolate MCP Server - Access entities, search, and evaluate functions

api_endpoint.title: Percolate API Endpoint
api_endpoint.description: URL of the Percolate API server (defaults to localhost)

api_port.title: API Port
api_port.description: Port for the Percolate API server (if not included in endpoint)

api_key.title: API Key (Bearer Token)
api_key.description: Your Percolate API key for bearer token authentication

oauth_token.title: OAuth Access Token
oauth_token.description: OAuth access token (alternative to API key)

user_email.title: User Email
user_email.description: Your email address (required when using API key)

mode.title: Connection Mode
mode.description: Connection mode: 'api' for API proxy mode or 'database' for direct database connection
